title: The Golden Hour
description: My name is Finn McCowen, and I want my revenge.Callisto Avellino was the heiress of one of the country’s most influential families. A delicate wildflower in a bed of thorns. And the daughter of the man who killed my father. Six years ago, she disappeared. She says she ran away to escape the poison of her corrupt family. Money. Prestige. Power. Murder.We have the same agenda - or so it seems: ruin the Avellinos at all costs. And if I have to put her in harm’s way to get what I want?So be it.
author: L.M. Halloran
